say hello and Dude example

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(somebody)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello("Dude")

'Hello Dude!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Dude")=="Hello Dude!"
{% endraw %}

Say HelloSayer Class

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(somebody)

Say hello to somebody using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
o = HelloSayer("Alexis")
o.say(), o.somebody

('Hello Alexis!', 'Alexis')
